full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LEGS BSHAD GSER GYI PHRENG BA LAS, GZHUNG 'GA' ZHIG LA RJED THOR BYAS TE BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @025A *, ,CES LEGS BSHAD GSER GYI PHRENG BA LAS GZHUNG 'GA' ZHIG LA BRJED THOR BYAS TE BKOD PA 'DI NI SNGA MA NAS SHOG DRIL RE GNYIS KYI THEM BYANG YOD PAR, 'GA' ZHIG GIS 'DI DAG GCIG TU BSDEBS NA ZHES BSKUL BA DANG, RANG NYID KYIS KYANG BAG CHAGS 'JOG PA'I PHYIR DU GYI NA BA THA MAL GYI 'DU SHES GSUM PAS BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSHAD SGRUB KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
